content: *⚠️ correction notice / pdf updated* **september 22 2025 ** we discovered an error in the leg pattern stitch counts for xs m and l sizes the pdf has been corrected we sincerely apologize for the earlier mistake and any inconvenience caused thank you for your understanding **september 25 2025 ** foot length stitch counts for all sizes have been revised for accuracy the pdf has been updated accordingly thank you for your feedback and understanding **ready to try your first cable socks ** these traditional cuff-down socks feature a stunning cable design that s simpler than it looks perfect for beginners who want to level up their skills the pattern covers four sizes xs l with clear instructions for leg foot gusset and toe shaping practice basic cables heel flap construction and the kitchener stitch finish while knitting a cozy pair of socks you ll love to wear if you notice any errors or unclear instructions please send me a message i really appreciate your feedback ** japanese version now available ** thanks to the kind support of keitoya https //www instagram com/keitoya_machida a japanese version of this pattern is now available
